column.name: TEST_SESSION_ID
column.remarks: Defines the test session id (To allow parallel tests)

column.name: RESPONSE_SEQUENCE_ID
column.remarks: Defines to which client request those responses are corresponding to

column.name: OPEN
column.remarks: The opening price is the first trade price that was recorded during the day’s trading

column.name: LAST
column.remarks: Last trade field is the price set during the last trade

column.name: BID
column.remarks: The bid price shown represents the highest bid price

column.name: ASK
column.remarks: The ask price shown represents the lowest bid price

column.name: VWAP
column.remarks: Volume-weighted average price (VWAP) is the ratio of the value traded to total volume traded over a particular time horizon (usually one day)

column.name: VOLUME
column.remarks: Volume is the number of shares or contracts traded

column.name: BID_SIZE
column.remarks: The bid size represents the quantity of a security that investors are willing to purchase at a specified bid price

column.name: ASK_SIZE
column.remarks: The ask size represents the quantity of a security that investors are willing to sell at a specified selling price
